1.content:
Nobody has ever really understood shrinking, though anybody could tell you about a person or group of people who have shrunk. Dozens of outbreaks have occurred every year for decades, seemingly without rhyme or reason. Shrinking doesn't seem to target any particular demographics of women, though there has never once been a case of shrinking in any girl under the age of 18.

When women do shrink, the results tend to vary. Most women end up somewhere between six and ten inches tall, though there have been cases of women dwindling down to a mere two inches. The tallest shrunken woman reported by a medical study was twelve inches tall. It's hard to find reliable statistics about sizes, however, due to the nature of shrinking. Many women who shrink become treated like property rather than people. It is not uncommon to learn that shrunken women have been given to children as toys or dolls. In fact, the federal government has yet to pass any national policies regarding shrunken women - all bills have been deadlocked in both the Congress and the Senate, and the Supreme Court has so far ruled against granting shrunken women special rights and protections in individual cases. Some states have begun initiatives to preserve the rights and citizenship of shrunken women, though others have taken a hands off approach. A few states - including Massachusetts, where Haerford University is - have actually passed laws on the state level to allow individual ownership of shrunken woman, decreeing that once a woman is shrunk she will either default to becoming the property of her immediate family should she choose to enter their custody, or can be registered by any citizen. Massachusetts passed the Reduced Women Protection Act (RWPA), setting up a government agency that processed the registration of shrunken women. Any citizen that finds a shrunken woman that is not already registered in Massachusetts can go online, upload a picture of the shrunken woman along with information such as age, height, hair color, date of birth, etc. and receive a certificate that grants ownership of said shrunken woman to the registering person. This was supposedly done to protect said shrunken women, though it often times results in women going about their day to day life finding themselves turned into property overnight. Many organizations in Massachusetts and in other states have fought this legislation, though a few wealthy corporations and lobbyists have paid off the governor and legislative body of Mass. to keep the ownership of shrunken women intact. The ACLU famously sent one of their lawyers, Olivia Carpenter, to Massachusetts to deal with the situation. Unfortunately, due to the RWPA and Olivia's height (five inches), she was reported missing within hours of her arrival. Journalists reported she was last seen being taken to her hotel room by a full-sized ACLU lawyer, and was reported missing briefly after that. There is speculation that the wealthy owner of the hotel chain (Emily Fitzroy) had her kidnapped, though Emily has not yet publicly come out for or against the ownership of shrunken women. Fringe theorists posit that Emily has been secretly donating money to legislators supporting the RWPA and has either sold Emily off to a collector or has kept her for her own uses. Some sources have alleged that Emily keeps Olivia on her desk at work like a paperweight or knickknack. Others suggest that Olivia has become Emily's personal stress toy. A few have crafted theories that Olivia was given to her daughter (Ophelia) as an 18th birthday/college acceptance present, and that Olivia has wound up a rich college girl's plaything, though Ophelia hasn't been seen with Olivia since starting studying at Haerford University.

Shrunken women are not exclusively in demand by children. There are also many adults who seek out tiny women. Some collect them, engaging in a grey market where women are sold and swapped in exchange for each other. Some keep them around as tiny friends and confidants (though most of these tiny women are kept by their "friends" unwillingly). Some are bought by companies, businesses, etc. to work as employees - Starbucks has notably employed shrunken women as mascots and spokespeople, while Mattel has contracts with eleven inch tall supermodels for their Barbie products. Other companies offer shrunken women for lease and for rent, for those who don't want or need a tiny person full time. And there are companies and individuals who use the shrunken women for more nefarious purposes - many have their own harems of shrunken playthings. Let's try not to focus on that last one too much.

Haerford University is the latest area in America to get hit by the shrinking. One day, students, faculty, etc. were going about their day like normal, attending classes and the like. The next - women found themselves suddenly small. Who will this story follow?

12333.content:
Anita turned heads wherever she went. She was statuesque, a 5'11" tall girl with raven black hair and tan, olive skin. She always wore the same styles of clothing (a black cardigan, black sweater, and either black pants or a black skirt and tights), and looked more like a model than an aspiring academic with her tasteful makeup and bright red lipstick. Faculty and students alike couldn't keep their eyes off of her. Whenever she taught, she knew that she had the undivided attention of everyone - men and women alike. She wasn't interested in any of this sort of attention, however - all she cared about was teaching and working on her thesis. She was always quick to shut down any sort of flirting towards her.

Anita stood in the dark in front of her Government 111 class one cool Thursday afternoon. It was the class designed for non-major freshmen (as well as any non-major students who had to take a political science course), and most iterations of the course were taught by PhD students like Anita. The class was just wrapping up - she was just finishing up a lecture on the history of parliamentary political systems in Europe. As usual, she had everyone's rapt attention - and she could feel eyes on her rather than on the powerpoint slides that were being projected.

Anita glanced at her watch. "Alright, just a few minutes left. Can everyone leave their essays on the desk at the front on their way out?" She asked, walking over to the lightswitch. She flipped it on and blinked her eyes. The light seemed much harsher than usual, disorienting her. She didn't think anything of it at first.

"Tonight's reading will be chapters 12 and 14" Anita said, walking back over to the blackboard. She kept a small space at the very top of the blackboard where she always wrote the homework, so that students could take a picture on their way out. She stood to write in the box, but had to stretch as far as she could to reach the box. She began to feel concerned - was there a shrinking outbreak? Would she be effected? How small she would get? - but tried to push the thoughts to the back of her mind. It couldn't happen to her - she barely interacted with anybody outside of her classroom or the office, and there haven't been any cases reported as of yet. Unless... maybe one of her students was exposed? Maybe one of her students had a tiny person or had handled one recently, and unknowingly gave the shrinking to Anita?

Anita felt winded as her thoughts began to spiral out of control. She sat down on the table in the front of the classroom, barely registering as students said goodbye and left their essays for her to read. Soon, she was all alone in the classroom. The next class would come soon, so she had about fifteen minutes to collect herself and leave. She noticed that one of her students forgot a backpack by their chair - but she didn't know who it belonged to.

She began to stand up, but then felt a cold chill, and her vision blurred. She felt as though she was weightless, and then she felt as though she was laying on her back. And she was - she realized as she slowly sat up that she had become small enough to lay on the table. It felt like she was laying on the hardwood floor.

She slowly stood up and gathered her bearings. The essays were to her left. She patted her pants pocket for her phone - she didn't have it on her. She looked over to the chair in the corner and realized she had left her purse and bag - with her phone, wallet, and keys - inside. At least they didn't shrink with her, like her clothes did.

She looked for a way to get down off of the desk. The fall was obviously too great for her, so jumping was out of the question. There weren't any dangling cords that she could use to descend. She might just have to wait until the next class began and hope someone would help her. Perhaps they would take her to the science building, and one of the professors there might know how to fix her.

She waited and waited and waited. Eventually, the student who forgot their bag came back to get it. It was:

123331.content:
Katie Weiss ran back into the classroom, making a beeline for her forgotten bookbag. "Thank god" she said as she double checked it to make sure that nothing was stolen. One of the other girls in her sorority that just joined lost her computer that way.

"Katie" came a quiet, tinny voice. "Katie, over here!"

Katie turned and looked to the doorway, not seeing anybody she recognized. She turned to her left and dropped her backback when she saw Anita, eight inches tall, standing on the teacher's desk at the front of the room.

"Oh. My. God." Katie said, approaching the desk. She bent down over the tiny Anita, studying her in a way like one would study a statuette in a museum. "Ms. Shirazi, you shrunk!" she said.

"Yes, I noticed" Anita said, trying to be patient with the giant girl.

"You used to look like a supermodel, but you look more like a doll now!" Katie said. She reached her hand over to Anita and began to play with her hair, rubbing it in her fingers and stroking it. Anita trembled slightly when the hand approached her, Katie noticed. "So cute" she said, poking at her with her giant fingers.

Anita held her breath as the giant girl poked and played with her, trying to remain calm. No use in angering the giant when she was the only one who would be able to help her.

Anita had to choose her next words very carefully. There was nothing stopping Katie from simply grabbing the shrunken woman and claiming her as her own. The government had yet to pass any laws about tiny woman ownership, and it would be relatively easy for Katie to hide Anita. The best course of action would be to have the giantess take her too someone responsible - like her advisor, or the Dean. The college could never weather the scandal of a graduate student being turned into a toy by her own institution. They would have no choice but to help her.

Anita was brought back to attention by the sound of a camera snapping. Anita looked up and realized that Katie had snapped a picture of the tiny teacher with her large hand stroking her hair. "Let's do a few more" she said. Katie's giant hand suddenly wrapped around Anita's torso and lifted her into the air, holding her up in front of Katie's giant face and phone. Katie smiled as she snapped a picture of Anita grasped in her fist. She then snapped a selfie of herself holding Anita up to her cheek, and then one more of her giving Anita a kiss that covered her whole face. Anita's tiny arms went up and pushed against the giantess's chin and cheek, but she was much too puny to stop her.

"Katie," Anita said. "Listen. I need your help."

"Really?" Katie said, her face lighting up with glee.

"Yes. I need you to take me to the Political Science office, ok? It's not in this building. You know where it is, right?"

"I think so," Katie said, putting her phone into her pocket. She smiled down at the doll-sized woman in her hand. "But why do you need to go there?"

"Because. I need someone to help me. Look how small I am. I can't get there on my own, and if you didn't come along I would have been at the mercy of whoever found me. Think about all the bad things that might have happened if you didn't find me."

"You're right" Katie said, unconsciously tightening her grip around the shrunken woman. Her eyes were wide as she thought about it. "You could have been, like, stepped on or something. Or picked up by a bird. But it's ok, because I won't let anything bad happen to you." Katie smiled again, and then gave Anita a quick kiss on the forehead.

"Right, um, that's because you'll take me to the Poli-Sci office." Anita said, trying to assert herself.

"I can't now! You got me thinking, and what if one of the people there wanted to hurt you or do bad stuff to you? What if they, like, gave you to the science college and they did experiments on you. It would be so horrible. So I'll take care of you."

"Katie - "

"Shhh, it's ok" she said, shoving one large finger into Anita's face. "I'll be nice to you, I promise. And I'll remember to play with you and change your clothes, too, even though I'm so busy with school. Now come on" she said. Katie unzipped her backpack and carelessly dropped Anita in. Anita landed on a large book, and then rolled off of it onto a pile of pens, a phone charger, and a few loose papers that had gotten crumbled up.

Katie zipped up the bag and walked out of the building. Anita was thrown around in the bag with each step.

Soon...

1233311.content:
Anita shielded her eyes as light poured into her bag prison. Katie had not been particularly careful as she scurried home, and Anita was quite badly shaken up. She found herself buried under a small pile of loose objects: pencils, pens, erasers, loose vials of chapstick and lipstick, as well as a few torn up crumpled balls of paper. Probably assignments that Katie had been given and hadn't completed, Anita thought.

Katie smiled down at her toy-sized captive. "Hiiii, Ms. Shirazi. Welcome home!" she said as she reached into the bag. She removed a couple pens and some of the other "rubble" covering her new captive, and then grasped Anita firmly around her torso and lifted her out of the bag. The tiny doll-woman tensed up and began to struggle as Katie grabbed her, and Anita found herself dangling at about chin-level above Katie's desk.

Katie began inspecting the toy-sized Anita once more. This time, she was a bit more thorough in her inspections - she was alone in her dorm room, and as soon as she went online and registered Anita. Katie toyed with the tiny Anita's body as she inspected her captive, noting how supple her tiny body was as she bent and caressed her. Katie was grateful that Anita kept in shape as she molested the tiny woman. Anita wouldn't be as much fun to play with if she weren't so fit. Katie liked how Anita wouldn't hold still in her hand. Every movement caused some muscle of Anita's to tighten or flex, and she liked how she got a good feel of Katie's firm backside or her flat stomach each time she fought against Katie's fingers. Katie idly rubbed her thumb up and down Anita's chest and stomach, encouraging further protests from her new doll.

Katie noticed that Anita had gone from looking pristine into looking a little disheveled. Her hair, once glossy and immaculately styled, now resembled bedhead, and her outfit went from looking like something a model would wear into a crinkled, stained mess. Her makeup had gotten ruined as well, though that was nothing that Katie couldn't fix. Anita still looked good - just slightly worn in. Maybe this was a good thing, Katie realized - her new toy was totally under her control now. She would find some better clothing for Anita if the tiny woman was good.

"First things first" Katie said, addressing her new doll. "I've got to get you registered. I'm sure you know about that stuff, right? Good." she said as she suddenly whisked Anita through the air into her lap. Anita sprawled out across Katie's lap, her face pressed into the skin of Katie's left thigh. Katie pet Anita, running two fingers up and down Katie's body from the back of her head to her calves, pressing her firmly against the giant woman's lap.

Katie pulled her laptop out of her backpack and set it on the desk. She opened up the RWPA's site (www.RWPA.gov), and went to the Registration page. A form opened up on the website. Most of it was about laws regarding shrunken women in Mass., and Katie skimmed most of it. She scrolled down to the fillable portion of the page and began to input information about her new pet.

"Ms. Shirazi, what's your full name?" Katie asked Anita, who was still face-down in her lap. Anita did not respond.

"Sweetie, what's your full name? I need to put it in the form." she said again, a little more bluntly. She scooped up Anita in both of her palms and lifted her up to her face. "I'm not trying to punish you, I'm just trying to make sure you're taken care of. Just tell me your full name." she said.

Anita crossed her tiny arms across her tiny chest and then looked away, refusing to meet her giant captor's gaze. Katie removed one of her palms, depositing the tiny woman gently into one hand, and used the other to stroke Anita's hair, playing with it in an attempt to soothe the doll-sized woman. Anita realized as she was handled that even if she didn't comply, she was still going to end up as the property of Katie. Registered or not, her old life was over.

"Anahita Pavlari Shirazi" she muttered.

"Good girl" Katie said. She tried to tickle Anita's stomach with her index and middle fingers, but Anita tensed up and didn't react to the attention Katie tried to give her. Katie, annoyed at Anita rebuffing her, unceremoniously tilted her hand, dropping the doll onto the desk next to the computer. Anita landed squarely on her ass, smacking hard into the wooden floor. She yelped in shock (if not pain) as she collided with the hard surface, standing up next to the laptop while rubbing her tailbone.

Anita was surprised as Katie suddenly snapped a picture of her. Katie turned the massive phone screen towards Anita, who gasped at what she saw. It was the first time she had seen her appearance since she shrunk. Being carried around in a cramped backpack and manhandled by the giant Katie was, unsurprisingly, not good for her looks. Her hair was already trussed and knotted, and had been flattened and frayed where Katie pinched and played with her hair. Her makeup was smeared. "You can't use that picture. I look hideous! I look like a cheap Robert Smith imitator" she said, horrified at her new appearance.

"Once you get settled I'll give you a makeover." Katie said, smiling down at the doll-woman. "I don't like your current look either, but I need a picture of you for the registration website."

"You couldn't have used one of the pictures you took earlier?" Anita asked.

"I guess I could have. But I'm using this one. Maybe once you've warmed up to me I'll change it" Katie said. "I am just trying to take care of you, is all."

Katie and Anita both stared at each other silently for a moment, Anita looking like she was about to rip out her hair. Katie's face had a condescending smile, though her arms appeared tense, as though she might suddenly reach for Anita. Anita then took a breath and tried to calm herself down. No need to antagonize her captor, especially when Katie could dominate her with just her hands.

"Moving on. Date of birth?" Katie asked. The tension felt significantly less severe when Anita didn't fear Katie's giant hands were about to snatch her up and manhandle her.

"March 19th, 1996" Anita said. She sounded a little more fearful (or was that respectful?) when she answered this time, not wanting the giantess looming over her to retaliate again. Katie entered Anita's hair color and eye color (getting her face uncomfortably close to Anita in order to inspect the doll-sized woman's eye color), as well as other miscellaneous information requested by the website. Katie fished a ruler out of her desk in order to take Anita's new height. She grabbed Anita with one hand and pressed her flat against the ruler, measuring the tiny woman at exactly eight inches tall.

Katie hit enter and watched as the screen changed. "Congratulations!" the screen read. "If your download does not begin in under 10 seconds, click here". She watched as a download began. In mere seconds it was done. She clicked on the file now saved to her computer, opening a PDF document titled "CERTIFICATE OF OWNERSHIP". It took some of the information Katie filled in and was a legal document detailing how Katie now possessed Anita. Anita was no longer legally a person - she was a cross between an adorable little pet and a doll. Anita was relieved that her horrible photo wasn't on the certificate.

"Yay!" Katie said, suddenly grabbing Anita in one hand. Anita tried to turn and run as she saw Katie's grasping fingers approach her, but was quickly trapped in Katie's vice grip. She yelped as Katie hand squeezed her around her torso and hips. It was a little too tight of a grip. "Katie - " Anita said, trying to get Katie to lessen the pain. She was cut off as Katie brought the tiny Anita to her lips and kissed her entire face. Anita put her tiny arms up and tried to push away Katie's face with her hands, though they pushed weakly on Katie's giant chin.

"I'm going to take such good care of you" Katie said, moving Anita from her face to her chest. She squeezed the tiny woman in a bear hug, pushing the tiny doll's body up against her stomach and breasts.

12333112.content:
Katie continued to dote on the doll-sized woman in her hands, sitting on her bed. Anita would have protested being toted around like a doll in Katie's hands if she could, but she was so overwhelmed by the size difference alone all she could do was squirm occasionally or squeak out pleas for mercy. Katie didn't seem to care. Anita was more toy than woman at this point, anyways. Katie liked how her toy moved and made sounds on her own. It pleased her greatly how Anita reacted to the way she was being held (whether that was with one hand or with two hands, for example, or whether Katie was dangling Anita upside down and shaking her or forcing her legs apart, like she was doing the splits). Katie accidentally learned that she could get a great reaction out of Anita when she squeezed the tiny girl in her fist. Katie didn't mean for this to occur, but her thumb pressed down on the tiny girl's breasts, causing Anita to wriggle and emit something between a scream and a laugh. Whenever Katie noticed that her doll was getting tired or going limp, she pressed one of the "buttons" on her doll, bringing her back to life immediately.

In truth, Katie had no real attraction to Anita. She recognized that Anita was attractive, but simply was not attracted to women. Touching Anita's breasts with her thumb or holding her butt in the palm of her hand did absolutely nothing for Katie. She simply liked the power she had over the doll-sized woman, and delighted in how she could do anything to (or touch anywhere on) the doll woman. No matter what she did, Anita's reactions amused her. She thought it was especially cute when Anita tried to bang her fists on Katie's fist and kick her legs. It was like she was throwing a tiny temper tantrum.

Eventually, Anita stopped reacting to Katie's touch, exhausted from constantly struggling and being handled by the giantess. Katie began to puppet Anita in an attempt to keep herself entertained, but she didn't like playing with the tiny doll woman when she wasn't moving on her own or struggling. Bored, she deposited the tiny Anita into her lap while she began to play with her phone.

After some time, Katie took Anita over to her desk and went back to her bed with her laptop. Anita laid on the hard surface of the desk, physically and emotionally exhausted, while Katie began to do homework. There would be time to play with Anita later, and Katie couldn't risk falling behind on her classwork.

Anita eventually fell asleep as Katie worked. She was awoken later by the sound of the dorm room's door opening and slamming shut. Startled, Anita lifted her head up and watched as another giantess walked into the room, shuffling right past the desk Anita was laying on. The giantess didn't even seem to notice that Anita was there. Anita was thankful for that.

"Hi Addy" Katie said, looking up from her computer screen. "Late today." Addy was usually home earlier in the day, but, for whatever reason, was late. It was already 7:30 pm and Addison was just walking through the door. It was going to be a late night for her.

"Hi Kate" Addy said back. She plopped down on her bed, laying on her back with her legs hanging over the side of her bed. She reached for her headphones, but was stopped by Katie standing up.

"Wait, before you zone out, check out what I got today" Katie said. She walked over to her desk.

Anita saw Katie walking over, a grin on her face. She got up on her hands and knees and tried to scramble away, but Katie's palm made sudden contact with her back, pushing her down. Her fingers wrapped around Anita, lifting her up off the table. Katie walked over to Addy, holding out Anita like a prized posession.

Addy gasped. "Is that...?"

"Yes" Katie said proudly. "I got her today. Her name is Anita. Isn't she adorable?"

"She looks soooo cute like that." Addy said, agreeing.

Without warning, Katie tossed Anita over to Addy. For Katie, the throw was only six, maybe six and a half feet. For Anita, it was dozens of feet.

Anita flailed as she was thrown, though she was so gripped with fear she couldn't even scream. Her eyes bulged out of her head as she passed over the carpet and hardwood below. She shut her eyes, fearing for the first.

Anita made contact with something soft, yet firm. Addy's hands. Anita had landed right onto her open palms. Addy's fingers quickly wrapped themselves around Anita's torso, gripping the tiny woman and holding her to Addy's chest.

Addy smiled down at the tiny doll, which is when Anita noticed something different about Addy. While Katie held Anita tightly, as if she were just an object or piece of property, Addy gripped her and seemed to be really feeling Anita up with her fingertips. Addy bit her lip as she slipped her fingertip underneath Anita's shirt, feeling her toned stomach and abs. Addy's hand now seemed to be trembling.

Anita, breathless, realized she was between a rock and a hard place. Katie, her legal owner, viewed her as nothing but a mere plaything to subject to her every whim. Addy, on the other hand, was very quickly developing an interest in Anita's body. Anita knew that if Katie wasn't in the room right now, Addy would not have treated Anita with such restraint. Addy wanted Anita, plain and simple.

Addy, realizing that Katie was still in the room, brought Anita up to her cheek and nuzzled her against it. "She's adorable" Addy said. "I wish I had a doll like her."

Katie grinned. She was glad her friend was envious of her prize. "I know. I've only played with her a little bit but I can barely keep my hands off her. I was supposed to go out with a few people upstairs to get into a bar later, since they've got fakes, but I'm thinking about staying in and just playing with her tonight." she said.

"I would too" Addy said. "If you go out, I'll watch her, to make sure she doesn't get into any trouble" Addy said. She stroked Anita's hair with one large finger. Anita shivered. The last thing she wanted was to find herself alone with Addy.

"Well, I'll think about it. And you can come too, if you want. Anyways, I've got to finish work first, and they won't be going out until 10:30 anyways, so I've still got three hours to finish reading and my other assignments" Katie said. "You can hang on to her for now if you like, but if I finish my homework before 10:30 I'd like her back."

Addy's heart rate quickened. "Ok" she said, smiling. She gazed back down at the doll in her hands. Even if she couldn't go all the way with her now, she'd have at least an hour or two with the doll right now. She wouldn't be able to do too much (she had homework to do, too). She would have to be discreet.

Addy decided to do her homework on her bed, and, for "safekeeping", stuck the doll in her lap in such a way that she was suspended between the giant girl's thighs. Addy occasionally shifted, making Anita squirm or fall deeper between the girl's massive thighs. Despite this, Addy did not betray the feelings that came over her, working quietly.

Anita was not enjoying being between the giant girl's thighs. She had changed into a pair of athletic shorts before she started doing homework, meaning Anita was being pressed directly up against the girl's skin. She could tell Addy was enjoying feeling Anita squirming and pushing against her thighs. It probably felt like someone was stroking them. She detested being used for Addy's pleasure. As much as she loathed Katie for taking her as a pet, Anita would much rather have been in Katie's hands rather than Addy's clutches. At least Katie didn't view her as a sex toy.

Katie seemed oblivious to her toy's plight. Maybe she didn't care.

Eventually...

Mandy felt like she went tumbling down a cliff and landed on a firm mattress.

"Maybe I'll keep you. You're look so cute when you're helpless" Theresa said, petting the tiny woman roughly with her index finger. "You'd make a cute pet, as long as you're good. And if you're not? I'll find another use for you. You could be a prop for the theater club's shows. Hell, you'd make a great Tinkerbell for Peter Pan. And if that doesn't suit you, I'll just give you away, or maybe sell you on eBay or something. You'll just have to find out, won't you?"

Mandy trembled, not daring to get up from the giantess's lap. She let Theresa probe and poke her wherever she pleased even when she touched her inappropriately, fearing what might happen if she displeased her former friend.

info.description:
This is the story of Haerford University, a public research university in New England. One day, all of a sudden, many of the women present on campus shrink with no explanation. Find out what happens to them. Feel free to add (I don't have a ton of GP, but I'll send GP to anybody who adds as long as your submission is a few paragraphs long and follows the rules). There are only a few rules for this interactive:

This is mostly a F/f interactive, though M/f is allowed. Any sexual interaction must be between characters both over 18. I'd say avoid including children in this story (you can write under 18 characters still, like teenagers, but they should not be involved in sexual interaction of any kind)

No vore, no feet, no watersports, no insertion, nothing too gross. Don't kill any characters, either (or seriously harm them. Imperiling them is fine as long as they aren't seriously maimed or killed).

Don't change a character's size once their height has already been established (example: if someone shrinks to 6", they cannot get smaller or bigger).

Chapters must be at few paragraphs long, and should continue the story. Add multiple choices to the end of each chapter, five if you are able. If you aren't able to, I will come up with some and add them later.

So far the only storyline I've started working on is Anita's. I'll get to others eventually, but in the meantime you can start or expand on your own.
